gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 104, Lakers 101
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks survive a late comeback and defeated the Lakers, 104-101. Luka Doncic recorded 30 points, 12 rebounds, and eight assists for the Mavericks, with Kyrie Irving adding 28 points and six rebounds in the victory. LeBron James tallied 26 points, nine rebounds, and seven assists for the Lakers in the defeat. The Mavericks improve to 10-5 in the regular season, while the Lakers fall to 9-7.
